# HOWTO for joining Aurora development in Eclipse.

= Prerequisites =

If you wish to participate in the day-to-day Aurora development, you need an acount on [http://path.berkeley.edu PATH server] with group membership _topl_.
You must be affiliated with UC Berkeley or with the TOPL project.
